TopicTitle: Mission Pictures, Rock Samples, Kerbal Museum

Articles.Content:
I love kerbal space program, but I find that once I complete a mission, such as landing on the moon. I have nothing to show for it but space junk. I would love for there to be a way for kerbals to take pictures and collect samples from the planet to bring back. These pictures and samples could then be viewed in a museum that serve as a testament of your accomplishment.

This could be expanded to have a camera part that could be added to sattelites and rovers to enable them to take pictures as well. I know I could do this documenting manually using screen captures but it seems more exciting when the pictures are taken by kerbals.

I hope that this isn't seen as simply being the already requested 'more cameras' feature. This feature is more about giving your space program a history and a legacy.

Being a game developer I understand a museum is not a simple thing to add to the game, but if this is a feature the developers think is worth adding I would love to see it added piece by piece over the releases.

This has been suggested and actually the developers have even mentioned a KSP museum as a potential feature to showcase your achievements in the future. I think it's still a maybe, but I wouldn't be surprised if they did add the museum at some point. First will be the knowledgebase, though...which is kind of like an interactive encyclopedia you seem to access from the map view. I suppose you'll be filling that out with science data and what-not. Maybe. I don't know >_>

Would be nice, though.

Anyways, Harvester mentioned something about camera arrays once, though it might've just been him thinking out loud about something modders could make. He seems to think out loud sometimes. But I'd love to see a little handheld(or chest-mounted, like real life) cameras for missions and such. I'd even be okay with placing cameras or having them on probes, even using probe cameras in place of an IVA view.

But such things have indeed been suggested before. Let's just hope the developers like them enough to implement them into the vanilla experience at some point.
There is a fixed camera mod. http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/hullcam-vds/
